summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein, Jes Staley, and Tommy Mottola, discussing a forwarded message that includes a YouTube video link. The email highlights the confidential nature of the communication and mentions potential attorney-client privilege.

persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley are engaged in a conversation via email.
Tommy Mottola forwarded a message to Jeffrey Epstein.
Tommy Mottola is forwarding a message originally sent by Jeb Brien.

keyFacts: The email was sent on February 12, 2010.
The email contains a forwarded message from Tommy Mottola to Jeffrey Epstein.
The forwarded message includes a YouTube video link.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
There are indications of unauthorized use or disclosure being prohibited.
